text: Yuri Ivanovich Ponomarev (July 10, 1946 - October 29, 2020) was a Russian politician and economist. He was a member of the Federal Assembly between December 28, 2001 to January 1, 2003. Pomomarev was born in Petrozavodsk, then-Soviet Union. Pomomarev died on October 29, 2020 at a hospital in Petrozavodsk from COVID-19, aged 74.Умер бывший заместитель премьер-министра правительства Карелии Юрий Пономарев ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Russia Category:Russian politicians Category:Russian economists Category:People from Karelia
title: Yuri Pomomarev
